name: breach-marketplace
description: Security-focused plugin marketplace for Claude Code. Tools for vulnerability hunting, security review, and bug bounty workflows.

plugins.name: breach
plugins.description: Security vulnerability hunting toolkit. Nine-skill pipeline with autonomous looping discovery for expert bug hunters: source code reconnaissance with threat modeling and git history analysis, custom Semgrep/CodeQL rule generation tailored to the target codebase, automated static scanning (Semgrep + CodeQL), autonomous looping code analysis with coverage tracking and auto-shift on diminishing returns, canonical finding structure and PoC standards, finding validation with anti-hallucination gates, production config verification, and anti-speculation checks, vulnerability chain discovery, human-verified reporting with AI quality gates (anti-verbosity, PoC validation, platform compliance), and pipeline orchestration.

plugins.name: hackerone
plugins.description: HackerOne bug bounty platform integration. Navigate programs, reports, hacktivity, and earnings via the HackerOne Hacker API.
